data.lyric:
[ti:Gone Till November]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Gone Till November - Rod Wave
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Tevin Revell/Jaehyun Kim
[00:00.46]Drum Dummie
[00:01.38]Kim J with the heat
[00:23.82]On the road halfway home
[00:28.66]Sorry my friend I don't wanna be alone again
[00:33.89]So I I'll be gone 'til
[00:36.64]November go in and mark your calendar
[00:39.94]Phone keep ringing heart keep breaking
[00:45.56]Uh no matter what I do can't keep nobody happy
[00:48.00]Can't keep these haters off me can't get along with my daddy
[00:51.03]I hope when they get older that my kids can understand me
[00:53.94]All I ever wanted with they mama was a family
[00:56.74]'Cause all I ever felt growing up was abandoned
[00:59.35]Pops went up the river left a n***a out here stranded
[01:02.37]But as I grew wiser I could finally understand it
[01:05.17]It seems since a teen I been on my own planet
[01:07.97]Lord knows I love my mama but
[01:09.42]I hate she think I'm crazy
[01:10.75]Then got out here on my own got
[01:12.45]In this world and made it
[01:13.73]All the s**t that we been through
[01:15.08]You would think that I hate ya
[01:16.54]Still put on my super suit
[01:17.73]Came back to you and saved us
[01:19.27]I was lost as a teen can't
[01:20.68]Believe that I made it out
[01:22.06]Can't believe I got everything that I prayed about
[01:24.90]And I knew for a minute what's too good to be true
[01:27.50]All the s**t I took you
[01:28.76]Through girl I apologize to you
[01:31.56]On the road halfway home
[01:36.34]Sorry my friend I don't wanna be alone
[01:40.37]Yeah alone again
[01:41.93]So I I'll be gone 'til
[01:44.20]November go in and mark your calendar
[01:47.72]Phone keep ringing
[01:51.07]Heart keep breaking
[01:52.69]Keep breaking
[01:54.74]On the road halfway home
[01:59.23]Sorry my friend I don't wanna be alone
[02:04.28]So I I'll be gone 'til
[02:06.71]November go in and mark your calendar
[02:10.49]Phone keep ringing heart keep breaking
data.trans:
[ti:Gone Till November]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.46]//
[00:01.38]Kim J通力合作
[00:23.82]在路上 回家的半路上
[00:28.66]抱歉 我的朋友 我不想再一个人呆着
[00:33.89]所以我会消失一段时间
[00:36.64]十一月再回来 去在你的日历上标注上
[00:39.94]电话响个不停 心还在隐隐作痛
[00:45.56]我不管怎么做 都不能带给任何人快乐
[00:48.00]都不能让黑子们不再仇恨我 都不能跟我的父亲好好相处
[00:51.03]我希望等他们 不再跟我的孩子一样幼稚之后 能够理解我
[00:53.94]我曾经只想跟他们的妈妈组建一个家庭
[00:56.74]因为我从小到大都有种被抛弃的感觉
[00:59.35]爸爸离开了 把某个家伙丢在这里
[01:02.37]但是等我心智再成熟了一些 我终于能够明白
[01:05.17]似乎从年少起 我就活在自己的世界
[01:07.97]老天知道我很爱我的母亲 但是
[01:09.42]我讨厌她把我看成疯子
[01:10.75]所以我独自离开了家
[01:12.45]去世界闯荡 并最终成功
[01:13.73]我们经历了这些磨难
[01:15.08]你会觉得我很恨你
[01:16.54]我仍然看起来无所不能
[01:17.73]回到你的身边 来拯救我们
[01:19.27]年少时我曾迷失自我
[01:20.68]难以置信我竟然能获得成功
[01:22.06]难以置信我得到了我所祈求的一切
[01:24.90]这一刻我知道了 什么叫好得令人难以置信
[01:27.50]我带你经历的所有这些不幸
[01:28.76]女孩 我向你道歉
[01:31.56]在路上 回家的半路上
[01:36.34]抱歉 我的朋友 我不想再一个人呆着
[01:40.37]再一个人呆着
[01:41.93]所以我会消失一段时间
[01:44.20]十一月再回来 去在你的日历上标注上
[01:47.72]电话响个不停
[01:51.07]心还在隐隐作痛
[01:52.69]还在隐隐作痛
[01:54.74]在路上 回家的半路上
[01:59.23]抱歉 我的朋友 我不想再一个人呆着
[02:04.28]所以我会消失一段时间
[02:06.71]十一月再回来 去在你的日历上标注上
[02:10.49]电话响个不停 心还在隐隐作痛
